title: Gas Pipeline Pressure Monitoring
description: A gas control room operator needs to monitor pipeline pressure to ensure it stays within safe operating limits.

tasks.description: Display real-time pressure readings from sensors along a major transmission pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: System shows a dashboard with live pressure data.

tasks.description: The system detects that pressure at one point is approaching its Maximum Allowable Operating Pressure (MAOP).
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a high-priority pressure alert.

tasks.description: Recommend an action to reduce pressure, such as slightly reducing flow from an upstream compressor station.
tasks.expected_outcome: System suggests a specific operational adjustment.
